She had felt all kinds of good in her life, but this was a whole new feeling to her. She felt ... great.

"Young lady," said Molly with mock sternness as she came over to collect the plate, "I can not believe how much you just put away. I have never seen you eat even half that much before."

"I have never eaten that much in my life," sighed Patricia happily. "You know," she added, listening to her body's urges, "I suspect that I could still eat some more." She patted her solid belly. "Could I maybe get a chicken sandwich? With lettuce and beet..."

"No," Molly cut her short. "I can't let you over-do it. You can do yourself a mischief over-eating like that. Honestly, anyone would think that you have worms." She folded her arms and rested them on her huge belly, the very act of which clearly brought a new thought to mind. "Are you pregnant?" she asked, concerned.

"Of course not. I have not had sex for months. Well, with a boy, anyway."

Molly seemed to let the addendum slide. "A few months doesn't rule out the possibility, 'Trish. You need to be sure. Have you had your periods lately?"

Patricia shrugged. "They've never been all that regular. With how busy I've been lately I cannot say for sure when I last had one."

Molly shook her head. "This won't do. Listen, my shift is over in half an hour. I have a pregnancy test kit at home I never used. I think you should come home with me so that I can keep an eye on you overnight, and in the morning we can test to see if that's a bun rising in your oven."

Patricia was not sure what to say. She liked the big woman on many levels, but was not sure if she was offering anything more than a couch to sleep on for the night, and she did not want to mess things up.

"I don't know," she stammered. "I mean, I don't have anything to sleep in."

"I live alone," Molly informed her, "and I am not a prude. You can wear as little as you like if you will grant me the same privilege."

The little woman was stunned. Even if this was going nowhere, she might get to see this awesome woman naked. But Patricia had no reason to suspect that Molly might be into girls. With anyone else Patricia would be game to take the risk of crashing and burning, but could she take the chance that she might damage her relationship with Molly?

And besides, Molly was determined to stop her eating, but she was still hungry.
12221.title: Patricia stuffs herself.

choices: She makes dinner for them.
She offers a distraction.
122211.content:
Patricia felt that she might not get another opportunity like this, and decided to take the chance. She smiled up at the large woman.

"Okay, if you insist."

"I do. It's for your own good." She turned to go back to her work but Patricia grabbed her hand.

"While I wait, could I please have that sandwich?" She looked up at Molly earnestly. "I assure you I'm not in any pain, and I am still hungry."

Molly looked down into puppy-dog eyes and her resistance melted. She sighed. "Alright, just this one."


Half an hour (and one sandwich) later Molly finished work for the day, removed her apron, collected Patricia, and waddled with her out to her car. Patricia was surprised that she drove a dark purple nine-seater mini-bus. When she asked Molly why she had a people mover the large woman just shrugged and told her it had its uses.

It was only a ten minute drive to Molly's home, a two bedroom flat above a small shop that specialised in selling Lego. Molly parked the car around the back of the building, and led Patricia up an external flight of wooden stairs and let her into the building. Molly stopped at a door just inside and turned to Patricia.

"The lounge room is at the end of the hall. I just need to use the loo."

Patricia nodded and wandered up the hall. The walls were painted lavender, with pale pink around the door frames and edgings. She passed a pair of opposing doors, open to reveal a bedroom on either side of the hall. Further down the hall were a kitchen on the left and dining area on the right, separated from the hall by a half-height wall. The hall ended at a room the width of the building, filled with lounge furniture and entertainment equipment. Everything matched, and the room stated firmly that a woman lived here.

The young woman sat on the lounge and leaned back, her hands feeling her full belly. It was firm, almost hard, and definitely swollen. If this is what being pregnant was like she could definitely get used to it. Her belly had never been this big before, but she was sure that she liked it.

So was she pregnant? She was sure that she wasn't, but if she was she could roll with that too. She would have preferred to grow taller, but growing outwards would be an acceptable second. She rubbed her full belly. Was there a baby in there? She'd find out in the morning. For now, she needed to see how tonight would play out.

Molly entered the room. Patricia noticed that she was still wearing her uniform - bib overalls over a yellow shirt - but she noticed that the clasps were now undone but the overalls seemed to be held up by her massive belly and considerable bust.

"How are you feeling?" the English woman asked her.

"Wonderful," the college student replied. "I don't think that I have ever felt this good in my entire life."

Molly raised an eyebrow. "Really? Not even during sex."

"Well, okay, maybe during sex," Patricia backpedalled, "but that is all-too brief. This just goes on feeling great."

"So, you're not in any pain or discomfort?"

"Not unless you count hunger. I could really go a bite to eat right now."

"That's not what I was looking out for. Nor, I must admit, what I was expecting. Surely you cannot still be hungry after all you've eaten this afternoon."

Patricia smiled cheekily. "Please let me prove you wrong."

Molly seemed to consider her options.
122211.title: She goes home with Molly.

choices: "Well it turns out you're not pregnant."
"Well it turns out you're pregnant."
1222111.content:
Molly was obviously having her doubts, but in the end she relented.

“Alright Hun, but don’t say I didn’t warn ya.” Molly got to work cooking up some dinner. All the while Patricia was rubbing her stomach entranced by the feeling.

“Dinner is Ready!” Patricia leaped to the table eager and a little excited to sate her strange hunger. “Now don’t go overboard Tricia we don’t need to eat all this food.” Her warning falling on deaf ears as Patricia was already loading her plate full of food.

Their dinner continued on as expected and worryingly Molly noticed the small girl was easily out eating her. The svelte but stuffed Patricia was scarfing down her food with unbelievable gusto. Molly was flabbergasted, little Patricia just kept eating her stomach not protesting in the slightest like it was a bottomless pit. What would her parent’s think, where was she putting it all she wondered?

When they finished eating Molly gathered up the dishes and the leftover food. She was honestly surprised there was any food left. “So, Tricia, is that greedy little tummy of yours finally satisfied?”

“Oh Yeah.” She sighed, the little girl looked a mess her cheeks flushed, and a satisfied smile on face. If one didn’t know any better, they might assume she had just done something other than eating herself into a stupor, she just lied back and contently rubbed her stomach under the table.

“You really enjoyed the meal huh?” Molly asked seeing her young friend’s flustered look. “A little bit!” Patricia replied feeling slightly embarrassed. “But you know what, I am feeling a little tired.”

“Well maybe you should lie down for a little while, but before that you are going to take that pregnancy test young lady.” Molly told Patricia. “Okay, let me just…oof.” Patricia started to say as she got up, but she encountered some unexpected difficulty. Molly helped her up at which point it was blaringly obvious where all that food had gone.

“Oh my!” Patricia said, the once scrawny little girl was now sporting a belly comparable to a woman five months pregnant round and taut. “Maybe that dinner wasn’t such a good idea.” She said felling embarrassed.

“Goodness me sweetie! Are you sure your okay?” Molly asked worriedly. “Yes it doesn’t hurt I just feel full… Uh, really full.” Patricia replied. Molly helped her to get to the couch. All the while Patricia reveling in the feeling of fullness. She felt so heavy each step hefty no longer light and nimble, her stomach was tight the skin so stretched every caress was ecstasy. She wished this feeling would never end.

Molly lead her to the bathroom and Patricia went in to use the pregnancy test. After she was done and preparing to leave, she noticed that her stomach kept touching the sink, and she kept bumping into the hamper. She had never felt cramped like this in her life, and as the thought sunk in, she got excited again. After she left she gave the test to Molly, and they continued their trip to the living room couch.

There just get comfortable and I’ll go clean up while we wait for this test to be ready. Molly said as she lowered Patricia onto the couch. “Thanks a lot… urp, Molly.” Patricia sighed as she curled up on the couch letting sleep take her.

In her dreams Patricia was standing in an empty expanse bathed in red and gold lights her stomach as swollen as it currently was after her recent binge. A gentle, but loud voice spoke to her from the nothingness. “Is this what you desire?” It asked. Patricia somehow knew what this voice was asking and as she stroked her stomach she replied. “Yes this is exactly what I want.” She wondered how and why this was happening and decided to ask. “So, am I like… pregnant?” The voice responded. “You are whatever you desire.” This answer excited Patricia and she cried out. “I don’t care whether I’m pregnant or not, I just want to be bigger! And bigger!... And bigger!…” She was so caught up in the thought that she didn’t notice as her dream self’s stomach grew and grew swelling like a balloon. 7 months… 9 months …. Triplets …. Quintuplets.

Patricia stirred from her slumber. Stretching out on the couch she her Molly from the kitchen. “She lives!” Molly chuckled out of sight. “Well Tricia I got your results.”
A red glow fading as Molly entered the room.
1222111.title: She makes dinner for them.

choices: Next morning Patricia has grown slightly bigger looking full term nearing twins.
Next morning Patricia has grown a lot bigger looking triplets or more.
12221111.content:
“Well it turns out you’re not pregnant!” Molly said as she entered the living room.

“Well that’s a relief” Patricia said as she stood up still feeling groggy. She noticed Molly was staring at her with a surprised look on her face. “What’s wrong?” Patricia asked then followed Molly gaze to her stomach. Which appeared even larger than when she went to sleep going from five months pregnant to six months pregnant if not nearing seven.

“Um, Molly that test said I wasn’t pregnant right? Cause I kinda look pregnant.” Patricia said feeling her stomach confused at what was happening.
Molly was beginning to freak out. She was utterly lost as to how Patricia’s belly had seemingly gotten fuller than it was a few hours ago. It just made no sense it has been long enough for Patricia to digest some of that food. If anything, her stuffed belly should have shrunken some, and yet here she was still large, and full and bigger.
“It’s okay Tricia, we’ll figure out what is going on, maybe you’re just gassy.” Molly said trying to keep both of them calm as she walked over to Patricia. “Look it’s getting late, and you need to get home so get ready to go, and hopefully this will be gone by tomorrow, but you might not want your parents to see you like this.” Molly said as she rubbed Patricia’s belly much to Patricia’s embarrassment. As Molly did though she noticed that Patricia’s swollen stomach didn’t feel tight at all, but not really fat either more so plush and pliable while still having a firmness to it. Unfortunately confirming Molly’s suspicions that’s not gas it’s all Patricia.

Patricia went into the bathroom to fix herself up combing her hair and washing her face, all the while feeling like she had forgotten something. Unable to recall anything from her fantastical dream as she fiddled with the pendant.

Having a moment to collect herself Patricia finally started to notice how tight her clothes felt now. Her swollen stomach protruding from her jeans. Try as she might there was no way she could get them anywhere close to buttoned. Even when she sucked in her stomach it was still as large as when she first started binging earlier in the day. Her button up shirt was pulled taut from her waist. The only reason the buttons were still holding up was probably because her pullover vest helped.

As Patricia looked into the full-length mirror on the door, she took in just how much she had change. Her limbs and face were still as thin as ever, which just made her blown up belly even more noticeable. She looked like she had swallowed a large basketball. She started to fondle her belly and as she did, she noticed like Molly did the strange plushness to it firm yet giving.

It was then that Patricia noticed how heavy she felt, normally she wouldn’t be able to move if she was as heavy as she feels, and yet here she was walking around like it was natural for her.

“None of this made sense, she’s not pregnant but she looks it, she is so much heavier and she barely notices, and most of all why does it feel so good?” she thought as she bit her lips.

As Patricia exited the bathroom, she did her best to tug her vest down, a bit of her belly poking out underneath. “You ready to go?” Molly said. “Yeah.” Patricia replied.

On the drive home Patricia was lost in thought trying to remember what it was she was forgetting something important. As she continued fidgeting with the locket around her neck Molly decided to lighten the mood. “Well at least you’re not so tiny anymore Tricia, let’s just hope you don’t get much bigger.”

“BIGGER!” Patricia thought a newfound realization dawning on her.

It was then that she felt it just like before. She was hungry again impossibly as it might seem. The look of embarrassment, of longing, and of shame obvious on her face. “What is it Hun.” Molly asked worried over Patricia’s sudden distress. “Um… Molly can we stop to get something to eat.” Patricia squeaked. Molly face showed her disbelief. “Are you kidding me? You’re not still hungry Tricia!” Molly said in a panicked tone. As if on cue both ladies heard an ominous rumble from Patricia’s stomach.

A few minutes late Patricia quietly snuck into her home, two bags of fast food in hand. She tiptoed upstairs and quietly entered her room. In her room she took off her clothes and slipped into a comfortable, and roomy nightie which was not as roomy as before. She turned on her laptop to watch Youtube and started relaxing, as she quickly worked her way through the fast food.

“Bigger…” She moaned as she stroked her tum. “Get bigger for me… much bigger.” Patricia whispered getting lost the feeling of her own swollen form, all the while oblivious as the pendant glows bright.
12221111.title: "Well it turns out you're not pregnant....

choices: Does Patricia go to the mall with Shirley?
Does Patricia go to the mall by herself?
122211111.content:
Patricia began to stir in the morning being awoken by the delicious smell of fast food. Her roommate Shirley must have picked some up for breakfast, and Patricia’s supernatural appetite wouldn’t let her miss out. As she started to wake up she noticed that she had been cradling her stomach in her sleep. She lazily turned over in bed and sat up, enjoying a good stretch while she thought of breakfast.

Looking down at the bed she saw a large mound under the covers which she new was her, a thought that filled her with unexpected glee. She got up and went to the mirror to see how much bigger she had gotten. Her belly had unsurprisingly gotten quite a bit bigger making her look at term or even a little bigger. Her hips had grown a bit too, and her arms as well if just barely, and everything else just seem slightly fuller and softer. Her once loose nightie could no longer contain her inflated form, the bottom of her round gut slightly visible.

Last night when she heard Molly say that word something clicked inside her. She didn’t know how this was happening, but she had realized this is what she truly wanted. Even though this change has been sudden and unexpected she couldn’t be more pleased, and as she looked at her reflection she couldn’t help, but think she looked great, she might even say sexy. She felt so indescribably wonderful, full of confidence, bursting with energy, and pumped to begin the day.

She waddled leisurely to the kitchen eager to get herself some breakfast. While Patricia prepared her meal her unsurprisingly heavy footsteps alerted her roommate Shirley causing her to come check on her friend. “Hey girlfriend! What’s with all the thumping around are you wearing your boots or something?” Shirley called from the living room.

Shirley sat down on the couch while Patricia continued rummaging in the kitchen out of sight. “Not exactly.” Patricia replied sheepishly as her heavy footsteps head into the living room. As Patricia entered the living-room she carried two plates of food in her hands. Shirley watched in shock as Patricia happily set her food on the table, and plopped down on the chair making it creak. “Oops! I sat down a little hard.” Said Patricia as she started working on her large breakfast. “PATTY! WHAT THE HELL HAPPENED TO YOU.” Shirley screamed.

Patricia was a little flustered by her friend’s sudden outburst. “Well, I may… have gotten a little bigger since yesterday.” Patricia replied as she took a large bite out of her big ham sandwich. “No SHIT! You look like you’re freaking pregnant!” Her friend continued. Patricia was starting to get annoyed by Shirley’s overreaction even though given the situation it was totally understandable. “For your information I’m not pregnant, Molly tested me yesterday, and contrary to what it might seem there is no bun in my over.” Patricia said with a slight hint of condescension in her voice as she started eating on a reheated slice of pizza.

“Are you kidding me Patty! That is even weirder, How did this happen to you?” Shirley continued seriously confused as to her friend’s strangely blasé attitude toward her freakish transformation. “Look it’s not a big deal, I’m fine, actually I’ve never felt better.” Patricia said trying her best to reassure her worried friend. Shirley looked at her friend obviously having a hard time believing her, but at least she was no longer freaking out.

“So, you’re not in any pain?” Shirley inquired. “Not at all, see for yourself.” Patricia said in between bites of jelly doughnut. Shirley got up off the couch and came over to Patricia’s side to feel her stomach. While she was rubbing Patricia’s belly, she couldn’t deny that her friend didn’t feel like she was pregnant. While Patricia was enjoying the attention Shirley noticed the new pendant her friend was wearing. “Hey where did you get this?” Shirley asked grabbing the pendant Patricia was wearing. “It’s beautiful.” This caught Patricia by surprise, and she had trouble remembering where she got it. “I found it on the way to the library I think.” Patricia said feeling strangely uncomfortable with her friend touching her pendent.

“Damn you are so lucky, can I borrow it sometimes.” Shirley said which caused something to snap in Patricia. Patricia’s eyes flashed a red color and as she snatched the pendant out of Shirley’s grasp. “No!” She replied while she stowed the pendent back into her cleavage and gave Shirley an annoyed look. “Okay!, Jezz I was just asking.” Shirley said confused by her friend’s behavior.

Patricia gathered up her dishes and went back into the kitchen to wash them after which she returned to her room. As she was getting dressed, she wondered what had come over her. Why had she felt so threaten by her friend, and why does she feel so protective of this pendent. As she thought about this she fiddled with the pendent, and slowly her thoughts started to change. Why wouldn’t she feel protective of the pendent. It is her pendent and hers alone, it makes her feel like herself, and no one else can have it.

As she continued on with these thoughts the red light shined in her eyes, and her stomach gurgled quietly in agreement. By the time she had finished getting dressed, she had decided she would need to get some new clothes. Because even her largest sun dress was tight on her newly twin sized belly, and she was only going to get bigger.
122211111.title: Next morning Patricia has grown slightly bigger...

choices: They stop by the food court in the mall.
They get some take out on the way home.
1222111111.content:
Patricia thought about catching a ride with Shirley to the mall, but she still felt weirdly defensive about her friend potentially daring to touch her precious pendent again. She thought about this as she was once again rubbing the pendent with her fingers, but she quickly pushed those thoughts away. What was she thinking Shirley is her friend, and besides she does have a car?

“Hey Shirley! Do you want to come with me to the mall, I’m going to get some bigger clothes?” Patricia said as she came out of her room. “Sounds like fun, just chill out okay.” Shirley called back as she got ready to leave.

As they were driving to the mall Patricia felt the need to apologize. “Shirley I’m sorry I snapped at you earlier, I just really love this pendent, and I don’t want anyone else wearing it.” “It’s okay Patty really, if you didn’t want me wearing it all you had to do was say so.” Shirley said sincerely, her face slowly changing to a look of confusion. “I don’t get what’s so important about that pendent, but whatever.” She huffed.

As the girls wander around the mall Patricia was quite a spectacle, People cleared a path for this small little girl with a huge belly. Her round tum bobbing up and down, bouncing back and forth as she swung it around. There was a spring in her step or more accurately her waddle as she soaked up all the attention. No one was ignoring her now and she couldn’t be happier this big belly was everything she had ever wanted. “Hey! Waddle slower Patty.” Shirley said trying to keep her friend’s pace. “How you’re so fast with that belly of yours I don’t know.” “Sorry Shirley, I guess I’m a little excited.” Patricia said as she slowed her pace a tiny bit. “Well, I guess I don’t need any more proof that your fine with that gut.” Shirley said giving her friend a sly little smirk. “You’re really enjoying yourself playing it up aren’t you.” Patricia blushed as she responded. “A little, is it that noticeable.” “Girlfriend you’re practically shoving your gut in peoples’ faces, you like making a scene.” Shirley said with a chuckle. “Well, I’m through with not being noticed.” Patricia said with a determined smile.

While Shirley was shopping Patricia waited for her, rubbing her stomach as she leaned against a wall. Looking around she noticed a cute guy fiddling with his phone was glancing at her occasionally, now obviously a lot of guys had stared, but this one was pretending not to. Patricia didn’t know why, but she decided to go over to him, and introduce herself.

“Hey, there.” She said as she walked up to him. “Oh, hey.” The guy replied obviously caught off guard. “Hi, I’m Patricia.” She said anticipating a response. “Patricia huh, that’s a cute name, I’m Ethan.” He replied, at which point Patricia moved a little closer putting her expanded stomach inches away from him, which obviously made him flustered. Patricia just looked at him waiting her cheeks red and a smile on her face, eventually Ethan realized what she was waiting for and spoke up. “So, did you want to get together some time.” Ethan said before he added. “After you deliver of course, or before, or whatever you want.” Obviously feeling very awkward about the situation. Patricia took his phone, and added her number in there before giving it back to him, and giving him a lustful look. “Call me some time handsome, and for your information… I’m not pregnant.” Patricia sighed and to emphasize her point Patricia slowly pushed her stomach into his crotch. The plush mound bulged around him, and he instantly became hard. “Jesus Christ!” He croaked as he slumped against the wall. Patricia sauntered off back to her friend, Shirley who having watched the exchange from a far was dumbfounded. “Girl, who are you, and what did you do with my friend?” Shirley said with a hearty laugh.

Patricia whole face turned red as she returned. “Oh my god, I can’t believe I did that.” She said with an unbelieving smile. “Damn girl, I think that guy just came in his pants.” Shirley said as she started rubbing Patricia’s stomach. “You’re turning my little Patty into a big perv.” She scolded Patricia’s tummy playfully, much to Patricia’s embarrassment.

The girls finally got to the clothing store, and Patricia set about looking for some larger clothes. After unsuccessfully trying out some shirts, it became clear she would need to go to the maternity section. It was here she found some clothes that fit better. As she was picking stuff out Shirley couldn’t help, but notice that Patricia seemed to be buying a few clothes that were for a woman much bigger than she was. What did she need those for? She wondered, is she going to grow some more, how much bigger could she get, how does she know? These thoughts really worried her, but Patricia had said she was fine so she guessed she was okay. She certainly seems to be enjoying herself, but there are limits right, she can’t just keep getting bigger.

Patricia got a few of the clothes together and went into the changing room. “Watch out for that pendent of yours, you might want to take it off.” Shirley hollered from outside the booth. Patricia froze at those words a disturbing chill overtaking her. She looked down at her pendent, Shirly was right she didn’t want it to get caught or something, an yet she couldn’t help but feel like it was a really bad idea. She had no idea why she felt so worried about taking off the pendent, and worked up the nerve to lift over her head. She removed the pendent uneventfully despite her feelings, and carefully placed it shelf in the changing booth.

She slipped on one of the maternity shirts, and looked at the mirror, and was pleased with how cute it looked, but then a sudden feeling of loneliness overcame her. Fear gripped her heart, and she was crippled by a sense of humiliation as she thought of everyone looking at her as a big bloated freak. She started to sweat as a strong sensation of emptiness manifested in the pit of her stomach despite its grand size, and then the strength left her legs allowing her to for the first time truly feel how immensely heavy she had become. She was overcome by the panic and doubt until her thoughts turned to the one thing that would make things right her pendent.

Hunched over in pain and cradling her stomach, she fumbled for the pendent until she grabbed hold of it. As soon as she touched the pendent, all that panic, loneliness, emptiness, and fear was washed away. She was still sweating as she frantically put back on the pendent, only feeling relieved once it was safely around her neck. “Oh, I’m so sorry my sweet, I’ll never take you off again my precious.” Patricia cooed reassuringly to the pendent, the iris of her eyes glowing an intense ruby red. Patricia felt the desire welling up inside her once more being enhanced by the power of the pendent, it was time for her to get even bigger.

Patricia carefully finished trying on the clothes this time without taking off the pendent. When she was done, she quickly paid for everything, and met back up with Shirley. As her and Shirley were leaving the store Patricia said. “Hey Shirley, do you want to get something to eat, I’m famished.”
1222111111.title: Does Patricia go to the mall with Shirley?

choices: Follow Patricia as she sleeps and wakes up in the morning.
Follow Shirley as she researches the pendent.
12221111112.content:
On the way home the girls pulled into the drive-thru for the local burger joint. When they were ready to place their order, Shirley was about to say her order, When Patricia reached over to her side and interrupted her. “Yes, Hi I would like five double burger combo meals, supersize them, two chili dogs on the side with everything on them, and lastly some spicy chicken wings.” Patricia sat back down in her seat excitedly bobbing in anticipation for her meal, a big grin on her face. “That will be all for, yeah?” Shirley corrected the cashier. “That will be all for that order.” She said with a hint of exasperation. As they pulled up to the drive-thru window Patricia once again invaded Shirley’s personal space and snatched up her bags all seven. It made Shirley’s single bag seem miniscule by comparison.

A pile of fast food bags sat between them, and as Shirley got back on the road, she noticed Patricia had already fished some food out from one of her bags. “God, Patty can you at least wait until we get back to the dorm.” “I can’t help it I’m so hungry.” Patricia retorted, not really paying any attention to her friend’s criticism.

When they finally got back to the dorm Patricia had eaten two bags already and was working on a third. Shirley followed carrying all of Patricia’s new clothes. “Thanks for getting my clothes girl.” Patricia said before stuffing one of the burgers in her mouth. “Well your hands are a little full, should I leave them on your bed.”

Patricia left her bags of food in the living room, while she went to get comfortable, and slipped out of the tight sundress. She grabbed one of the new maternity shirts one that was big, but not to big probably meant for triplets, and some of her new stretchy extra-large shorts.

When she returned to the living room Shirley had started eating her meal, and Patricia sat down to join her. “Well, I gotta admit that belly sure does look good on you.” Shirley said causing Patricia to blush. “Thanks.” Patricia said before she started tearing into her food taking huge bites. Shirley couldn’t believe a girl as tiny as Patricia could eat like that, and she had no idea that her friend lil’ Patty had such an appetite. Patricia was rubbing her stomach and moaning in an awkwardly sexual way, which made Shirley feel really weird. “You good?” Shirley asked eliciting a nod and moan from Patricia. Shirley was entranced and almost impressed with the gluttonous display, especially when Patricia almost deep-throated one of the chili dogs without hesitating. She swore she could even hear her friend’s skin stretch as she rapidly scoffed down her food.

Drawing her attention away from her friend’s feeding frenzy, Shirley tried to collect her thoughts, and started to think about what was happening to her friend. “Hey, Patty you said you found that pendent two days ago right?” Shirley inquired. Patricia had just polished of her fifth bag of food when Shirley asked her question, causing her to stop and think for a second. “Uh, yeah I think.” She said sheepishly before she got to work on her sixth bag of food. Shirley finished her food and went into her room, leaving Patricia to herself.

Two days ago, her friend wasn’t blown up like a balloon thought Shirley, as she got onto her computer. I think I’ll do a little research, and see if I can’t find anything about that pendent of yours Patty, Shirley said to herself, as she went to her search engine.

Patricia was feeling very uncomfortable, as she had finished off the last of her food her new maternity shirt had started to feel tight. As she leaned back on the couch sweating and panting, she was overcome by a sudden lucidness. She was tired and could feel a food coma coming on, so she hefted herself up off the couch, and headed down the hall to her room feeling less steady. As she lumbered down the hall she faintly noticed a voice although she was too out of it to understand it.

“You shall have that which you desire.” It whispered in her mind, at which point Patricia felt like her shirt was shrinking. She stumbled awkwardly into her room, and sluggishly crawled onto her bed. As her clothes grew tighter and tighter, she rolled onto her back, and felt herself sink lower and lower into the mattress. Then suddenly one by one the buttons on her maternity shirt burst off pinging across the room, and when it was all over Patricia was spread out on the bed drifting off to sleep. Her stomach having grown into a round fecund sphere that rival that of a woman carrying quadruplets,

“You shall grow bigger.” The voice whispered as the pendent shone brightly.
12221111112.title: They get some take out on the way home.

choices: Return Patricia's pendant, you did promise.
Take the pendant. (change things up)
122211111122.content:
Shirley had been searching the web for a while, but unsurprisingly typing magic crystal into a search engine didn’t have the desired result, turning up links to holistic crystal therapy, and anecdotes about J-O crystals. She decided to change up her strategy, the pendent obviously had strange powers, and Patricia said she found it on the way to the library, where would someone get something like that. She decided to search up any curiosity shops in the local area, and she found one possible choice. She visited the store’s site and got an email address. Now all she needed was a picture of the pendent to send to the place.

As Shirley peeked into the room, she could see a large shape on the bed, which she quickly identified as her roommate much to her disappointment. “You grew bigger again didn’t you Patty” Shirley said as she went to her sleeping friend’s side. 123112.content:
Patricia's hunger pangs were already driving her mad. The artistic posters of famous candies on the wall, the smell of fresh chocolate from the factory floor below, and the sound of a thousand chocolate bars being wrapped at a time: it was enough to drive anyone mad with hunger. And Patricia's appetite was already bordering on the supernatural.

Patricia was desperate for a bite of anything, but she knew she couldn't just pull food off the factory floor. Company heiress or not, there were still rules. But then she noticed how familiar her father's desk was to her. She flashed back to her childhood, visiting the factory. Her father would always keep the company's latest innovations in his desk drawers and let Patricia have a taste. "Only a couple, Patty," he would say as she gobbled down the delicious treats. "Eat too many and you'll get fat! Wouldn't want that, would we?"

Patricia laughed and patted her hefty belly. She felt like she had gained twenty pounds since this crazy binge began. If Dad saw me now, he'd probably flip. She pulled open the top desk drawer, and saw the piles of wrapped goodies inside. The very sight of something edible sent her stomach growling.

Patricia picked up the top bar. A bright-green wrapper with a large, friendly looking name: "Bulk Up Bar!" Patricia flipped it over and read the back to herself. "Designed with the best intentions, Bulk Up Bars are crammed with proteins and carbs. Helping everyone from malnourished children in the third-world, to bodybuilders looking for a post-workout snack."

And then the nutritional facts caught her eye. She actually gasped at the whopping numbers. "One-thousand, two-hundred calories per bar? Forty-five grams of protein? Five-hundred grams of carbs?" Patty's hands were trembling. She couldn't have held back if she wanted to. She had to have this chocolate bar in her mouth.

She tore open the wrapper with her teeth and took her first chomp out of the hunk of almondy chocolate. Her taste buds screamed with bliss. It was the greatest feeling just to taste it, and Patricia knew it would be even better to feel it fill her up.

Not that anything's filled me up so far... she thought. The first bar was already gone. Patricia tore through another, and another. The desk was filled with a dozen. By the time the seventh wrapper fluttered to the floor, Patricia had to pause for a breath.

She leaned back in her father's executive office chair and admired the return of her heaving belly. Eight-thousand calories. I just ate eight-thousand calories, and I feel like I could eat eighty-thousand more! As much as she loved how huge and round her belly was growing to fit her meal, the insatiable hunger was almost starting to bug her.

Almost.

Patricia gave her full belly one last graceful rub before returning to her binge. She stared at the posters of chocolates and taffies on the wall as she chewed down her ninth bar. She grinned down the window toward the factory floor as she inhaled her eleventh bar. And she gasped in pure ecstasy as she actually saw her stomach slowly swell outward at the last gulp of the twelfth and final bar.

Patricia felt huge. She worried she wouldn't even be able to stand up from her chair with a belly so enormous. But sure enough, she rose to her feet and almost didn't feel burdened at all by the massive weight in her gut. Maybe my back is getting stronger, she smiled. Guess it doesn't matter. I'll digest it soon enough.

The numbers ran through her head. I just ate fourteen-thousand calories... I ate in ten minutes what most people eat in a week. And despite her utterly huge belly extended to hold it all... I'm still hungry...

Patricia had to spend another moment running her fingers up and down the mountainous curves of her stomach. She looked like she was nine-months pregnant with quintuplets. The slight buildup of fat from her first meals would be nothing compared to fourteen-thousand calories digested and distributed to her body.

Suddenly, there was a knock on the office door. "Patricia, you okay in there?" It was Alice, the security guard. She had seen Patricia just twenty minutes ago, when she was a little chubby. But now that Patricia's belly was a bloated beach-ball of fat, the difference would be too obvious. There's no way to hide it! Crap!

But before Patricia could say anything, Alice opened the door and came inside. It took a moment before she seemed to really see how Patricia had changed.

"W-what-what the hell?!" she stammered.

"Alice, close the door! I can explain!"

"What happened to you?! Patricia, are you sick or something? You... you're stomach!"

Patricia chuckled and rolled her eyes, trying to defuse the tension. "I'm just... binging and little. Freshman fifteen, right?"

Alice was wide-eyed in disbelief. "More like freshman five-hundred!"

"Hey! I'm not that big! ... Yet..."

"Yet?! You're gonna get bigger? Wait, Patricia, what the hell are you doing? What's happening to your body?!"

Alice saw it before Patricia felt it. Her stomach was already digesting her latest meal at high speed. Her belly slowly shrank as the rest of her body slowly grew. Her arms and legs began to thicken with fat. Her new love handles developed into rolls. Her breasts, a little chunkier since this morning, fattened up and grew hefty and perky under her straining bra and top. Her ass cheeks felt like they would burst out of her jeans at any second.

And not only was Patricia getting fatter, she was getting taller. Her view rose very slowly, but it was still noticeable. The general increase in size did not help her already straining clothes. Alice was breathing heavily in amazement as the expansion slowed to a halt. Patricia looked down at her belly. Fat, but not nearly as hysterically huge as a minute ago. Overall, she looked like a normally-proportioned overweight girl. A few inches taller, and maybe fifty pounds heavier than before. Her clothes were so tight around her new-found fat that one more meal would probably push her body right out of them in shreds.

"How..." Alice stared dreamily. "What the hell just happened...?"

Patricia just shrugged. "I don't know, but I'll be getting a lot bigger before I leave here today."

"No..." Alice shook her head. "This is nuts! You're... how can you grow so fat and so quickly??"

Patricia could tell Alice was in awe of her. She wasn't just scared, she was enamored. She probably loved huge curvy girls just as much as Patricia. But the strangeness of the situation was still making her anxious. Patricia knew she had to calm her down.

"Alice, listen. I know you like this. I'm going to get bigger, no matter what you do, so why don't you help me out? I saw the way your eyes lit up when I walked in here."

"When you walked in here you were a little pudgier than usual!" Alice laughed nervously.

"And now I'm much pudgier than usual! And I'm going to keep eating and gaining and growing. I know you love it, and I know you want to see me grow fatter in front of you! You almost drooled when you saw me growing just now! Help me out, and we can find out just how massive I can get together!"

Alice stared quietly in thought. She took a moment to admire Patricia's curves and heaving chest, and finally spoke.

Alice shook her head. "No, this is nuts. This is insane!"

Patricia simply chuckled. "I think it's a little crazy too, but I'm not going to stop. Get out of my way, Alice, I'm going down to the factory floor."

"No!" Alice swerved in front of the door. "Patricia, this is your father's factory, not yours! I'm escorting you off the property."

Patricia chuckled again. "Alice, I like you, but you're just a security guard. You lay a hand on me and I'll sue. Daddy will have you fired, and we'll make sure you never work in this town again." Patricia felt awful being so crass. She had never acted like a spoiled heiress before, but then again, an employee had never stood in the way of something so incredible before. "Stand down, Alice, or it's over."

Alice furrowed her brow. "Fine." She stepped away from the door and approached Patricia. "I can't stop you, I'm just a guard." She cautiously stepped behind the desk. "But I can call the cops!!" Alice reached down and hit the concealed button under the desk. Suddenly an alarm rang out through the entire building. An automated announcement on the PA ordered all employees to evacuate due to an emergency.

"No!" Patricia cried. "Damn you!" She knew the cops were on their way. She'd be arrested, if not for some trumped-up claim by Alice, than for near-public nudity.

"I'd say they got six minutes before they get here and haul you away," Alice glared. "Then you're their problem."

Patricia glared back in fury. But her anger came nowhere near to the magnitude of her hunger. Her stomach was already roaring for sustenance. Six minutes. I've got six minutes to eat as much as possible and grow as huge as possible. I won't survive on jail food! Patricia turned to the door and bolted toward the factory floor. The last of the employees had already fled out of the emergency exits, leaving the machines running on full speed. Chocolate bars were tumbling off conveyor belts unpackaged. Caramel wafers were being overcooked. Whipped cream was churning unattended.

None of it was enough. Patricia needed more than a single handful at a time. She needed to binge like there was no tomorrow. And that's when she saw the tank.

The tank was more like a silo. It spanned three stories in height, and contained forty-thousand gallons of heavy whipping cream for the incredible amount of whipped cream produced each day. A single mouthful of heavy whipping cream was nearly a thousand calories. Patricia had always added it to her coffee in hopes of gaining weight. Now, it would help her more than she could have ever imagined before today.

Patricia ran straight up to the tank. There was a dispenser hose for filling up any sized container, from a light pour to fire-hose level spray. Patricia wrapped her lips around the nozzle and carefully cranked open the smallest valve. Just as the first taste of heavy cream hit her tongue, Patricia flashed back to a couple weeks in the past.

A boy at a frat party had chugged down five cups of beer in four seconds. He had let the liquid pour straight down his throat to his stomach. Impressed, Patricia flirted with him to learn how it was done. No doubt out of hopes of getting a blowjob before the end of the night, he cheerfully taught Patricia how to relax her throat and just let water pour straight down. A strange, almost-drowning feeling, but it worked. Patricia practiced the entire night, and by sunrise, she had it like a natural. She went home with a new skill and her tutor passed out untouched by her.

With potential gallons of heavy whipping cream about to enter her stomach, the skill came back as naturally as riding a bike. Patricia relaxed her throat, and for twenty full seconds, heavy whipping creamed poured down her throat at high speed. She pulled back and gasped for air. Cream was pouring out the hose onto the floor, but there was more than enough. As long as I can hold my breath, I can drink. The revelation formed like a challenge in her mind. Patricia took another deep breath and enveloped the hose again. More cream rushed into her. Her belly was already stretching out to accommodate the gallon of heavy cream she had chugged in less than a minute.

More!! she thought as she guzzled down more and more. I need so much more!! It feels so incredible! So filling!! Patricia's belly was actually proving impossible to fill. It continued to stretch and stretch. There wasn't a single stretch mark or feeling of discomfort (in fact, the gallons and gallons of cold cream sent wonderful shivers through Patricia's body). The ridiculous beach-ball size her gut had reached after twelve Bulk Up Bars came and went, but Patricia wasn't even close to feeling full.

Ten gallons, fifteen, twenty. Her belly filled more and more. It began to look less like an exaggerated pregnancy and more like a massive orb of flesh filling up like a water balloon. Although she had no way of knowing, Patricia had already drank 300,000 calories of delicious heavy cream. A normal human being would have drowned or died of shock from such a massive intake, but Patricia actually found her chugging grow easier by the second. She could hold her breath for longer, and allow even more to pour down her throat. She became so engrossed and enthralled by it all, she almost didn't feel her belly reach the cold factory floor, even though she was still standing...

+++++++++++++++

Alice had finished calling Patricia's father. He hadn't picked up, and Alice realized how frantic and psychotic her voicemail message had sounded. Why would he believe his daughter was actually gaining weight and height faster than humanly possible? What could she possibly be doing down there on the factory floor anyway? Alice raced down the stairs and looked around. The machines were all running, wasting a massive amount of ingredients. She weaved through the floor, and finally spotted Patricia's backside.

"Patricia, the police will be here any minute. And I called your father. I don't know what made you think this is a good idea, but you're..." she trailed off. Patricia had turned to face her, revealing the ludicrously gigantic sphere that was her belly. Asked the second person in the group, it was Jane the front desk girl, both ladies were of Hispanic origins and almost looked like sisters, with the exceptions of Sharon being almost 6"0 and Jane being 5"3, with one being deep brunette and the other light.
"Now now, I'm sure we're all off for something good, where you headed to Esther?" Asked their third companion, Danny, a Sales rep from the second office. "Esther blushed a little and replied "Barbecue, korean or japanese, I haven't decided yet but I figured I'd know which once I was in the parking garage." Jane and Sharon stopped their bickering and looked to her "Really, we were just talking about going for Korean BBQ, the new place that opened over on Harbor and Flasker st." Sharon said excitedly, "You should totally join us, we can always use a new voice for our discussions." Thinking it over as the elevator dinged, Esther looked to them and replied "Sounds good, I'm always happy for extra company." Knowing with extra people meant extra orders of food and placing a hand on her stomach she would be able to eat more.

All four of them piled into the elevator and went down to the garage, "Whos driving this time?" Danny asked this time, "I'll drive, I was going to anyway so might as well take everyone." Esther told them, holding up her keys, one benefit of driving a Honda Pilot was the sheer volume of space, and walking to her car got the three amigos into her vehicle and drove off after inputting the address into her navigation.
Arriving and walking in 10 minutes later, all 4 were seated at one of the side tables with some roomy benches. "So, all you can eat for us all right?" Sharon asked everyone, Esther immediately responded with "Yes, please, I've been extremely hungry today." She lied partially having had her yogurt breakfast with nuts and apple slices from earlier so everyone would order extra. "Alright then what soup and meat to start with?" Jane asked?

Esther couldn't decide if she wanted classic Kobe and Short Rib, or pork slices and chicken.
155321.title: Korean or Japanese BBQ

choices: Stay and eat for the full 2 hours
Head out and eat elsewhere and ditch the 3
1553211.content:
The 4 start chatting to pas the time discussing random bits from around the office and media they've been watching but Esther was only half engaged. She wanted her appetizers just so she could get started and dig into her new indulgence and it occurred to her, she wasn't going to leave either and head back to work. She loved how it shot a thrill through her like an electric charge. She loved how it made her feel, and she wasn't going to let this newfound excitement go away.
Soon the appetizers arrived and everyone dug in, Esther quickly realized how slowly she still went compared to the others and keeping her manners. Danny she noticed was almost inhaling his food as the ladies chatted and he listened to them. Esther quickly followed his lead as best she could being a smaller person with her mouth not opening quite as large but she was able to eat her food faster now. "Looks like she wasn't kidding about being hungry." Danny cut in stopping Jane and Sharon the 3 turned eyes on little proper Esther who found herself stopping for a moment "What?" She asked with a partially eaten Gyoza in her mouth as the waitress suddenly appeared with their order placing the meat platters on the table. "Hey, meats here!" She said suddenly to change the attention of everyone to dig in.
"Woah, this smells amazing once it starts cooking." Sharon said taking a piece off and dipping it in ponzu. Esther couldn't agree more as she snagged several pieces and replaced them with her kobe. Chatting recommenced as they ate, Esther making sure she got her lion's share as they ate. "Anyone else ready for round two?" Esther asked everyone as she grabbed a third of the remaining meat. "I'm ready." Danny replied quickly, "Definitely might tap out but yes." Jane said. Sharon nodded and continued chatting, flagging down the waitress Esther placed he second round adding on a few extra appetizers. Reaching down and feeling her middle she was surprised to feel a small bump from its fullness, and yet she didn't feel as stuffed as she expected. As the appetizers arrived and shortly and soon the new platters, Esther surprised herself as she kept packing away food.

She wasn't sure if she was like the big eaters for those hotdog contests or just lucky on the genetics, but she wanted to push and see how far she could take it but keep eating at the restaurant for the full two hours or head off and eat elsewhere. She needed to see just how full she could be, how big she could get.
1553211.title: Start with Kobe and Short Ribs

choices: Caitlyn: A hungry girl with a Voracious nature
Veronica: Wants to be the biggest
Create a New Girl
15533.content:
Caitlyn:
A Hispanic chica, 5"7, 19 years old, light brown wavy hair, slim as a stickand hates how flat and bony she is. Shes beautiful by everyone's standards but her own and her need to fill out is strong, she longs to be fluffy with curvage and doesn't care how she reaches that goal.

Veronica:
A Filipino lass, 5"5, 24 years old, a thicc curvy figure, dark hair and blue eyes, with a light browned skin. Always felt she has been pushed down and around all her life, being a minority, being a woman, and told she just wasn't good enough. She wants to feel big, she wants to feel like shes the boss and in control. Being able to throw her weight around without anyone that can stand to her.
15533.title: Create Additional New Girls

choices: Kinsey: Tech Girl
Tara: Big Chef
Create new girls
155333.content:
Kinsey:
Caucasian lady, 5' 4", 20 years old, vibrant red-head, nearly stick-thin figure but not 100% concerned about it for now. While in college, she studies and learns about every form of technology, hardly has time for a good meal. One day while experimenting, her own technology goes on the fritz and begins to alter her own way of life, particularly her own appetite and cravings.

Tara:
Caucasian lady, 5' 7", 25 years old, brunette, bone fide SSBBW. Finishing up college, she is currently working on building a culinary career. Soon comes across a strange cookbook with particularly promising recipes but has a strange outcome over each new meal she makes out of it.
155333.title: Create a New Girl

choices: A Recipe for "Big-Booty Biscuits"
A Recipe for "Super-Size Scones"
She goes straight for another brownie, or two, or ten...
1553332.content:
Tara felt herself doing genuine double-takes between her cookbook and her body. "Bake Your Way to Power", the cover advertised in bright colors, "Recipes for the Insatiable." She glanced back at her body, at the tears in her blouse and the way her nail polish had shrunk on her fingernails. "No, it didn't shrink," she realized with certainty. "I grew..." Gaining weight from a brownie was normal, but gaining thirty pounds in the time it took to lick the chocolate from her lips was not ... much less growing taller...

         She glanced back at the tray of brownies she had just sampled. A single brownie, a single serving, and her entire body had plumped up in response. But that wasn't possible, was it? She checked the brownie recipe in the book again. No fine print about somehow packing 30-pounds worth of calories in a single brownie, only the suddenly suspicious title "Giga Brownies."

         Tara once again took in her body, admiring the extra padding. She had already been "super-sized big" in her own words, and an extra thirty pounds might even go unnoticed to most people in her life (although the extra height would be harder to hide. She had entered Culinary School knowing she'd want to cook her way to bliss than rely on restaurants and fast food, and in three years she had nearly tripled in weight, eating everything her courses asked her to produce.

         "It'd be a shame to let them cool," she sighed, trying to coax herself into trying another. "One more, just to make sure I'm not going crazy." She practically inhaled the second brownie and looked down. The growth spurt arrived as immediately as the first one. Her breasts fattened further in her bra, pressing up and out, as her belly grew rounder and heavier. And this time she saw the floor descend away from her as she grew upward. "HOLY SHIT!" she erupted into laughter. "This can't be real." She picked up the cookbook. "There's no way." She began flipping through the pages like mad. "What else is in here??"
1553332.title: Tara: Big Chef

info.brief_description: Ladies love to eat and grow, some are insatiable, can you satisfy them?
info.description: The plot and story for this can have weight gain by any means, can grow to to any size, not instantaneous, but slow enough it can last. The ladies can eat whatever you deem edible to them as they grow. they can be a vast huge blobs of fat or towering big bellied giantesses. Just keep it fun and give it a bit of story when you add.
